name: mosaicist
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone who makes mosaics (= patterns or pictures made from many small pieces of coloured stone or glass): Mosaicists were employed to decorate the arches of the church. The differing quality of these mosaics suggests that there were a number of different mosaicists.
More examplesFewer examplesHe trained as a mosaicist in Venice before moving to Florence.The mosaicists spent months creating a magnificent floor in the building.The human figures are thought to be the work of Greek mosaicists.We are looking at the work of anonymous medieval mosaicists. These mosaics are believed to have been created by a single mosaicist.
